text: Ko ɓen woni ko yeddi, ɓe faddii on e Juurlirde Hormorde nden, [ɓe haɗi] neldaari ndin nde ndi yottotoo nokku mayri. Si wanaano sabu worɓe gomɗimɓe e rewɓe gomɗimɓe ɓe on anndataano haa haɓon ɓe, bakkaatu heɓa on e fee maɓɓe, ko aldaa e anndugol... fii yo Allah naadu e yurmeende Makko nden, on mo O muuyani. Si ɓe senndondir-no [e gomɗimɓe ɓen], ko pellet, Men leptirayno yedduɓe ɓen e maɓɓe, lepte muusuɗe
